columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name of the root.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID) for the root.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the root.

columns.name: policy_types
columns.description: The types of policies that are currently enabled for the root and therefore can be attached to the root or to its OUs or accounts.
